title: Ticket #4544: RequestMemory not enforced if not in Requirements?
description: Moate reported a problem yesterday (2014-08-20) where when he submitted jobs with a Requirements expression equivalent to Machine == "target-machine", and RequestMemory of 4GB, the job would run a 2GB slot. It would appear that the startd is not properly enforcing RequestMemory (perhaps selecting the smaller of RequestMemory and the slot's available memory?). This is using cgroups (the problem is detected by the job using >2 GB of RAM) and partitionable slots, in the CHTC.
